```{r}
library(xts)
library(tidyverse)
library(ybp)
library(fishtrackr)
Sys.setenv(TZ = 'Pacific/Pitcairn')

d <- all69khz_grouped
d <- arrange(d, DateTimeUTC)
str(d)
dx <- xts(d[, -1], order.by=as.POSIXct(d$DateTimeUTC))

head(dx)
```
